insert into eb_store_product_reply (id, uid, oid, unique, product_id, reply_type, product_score, service_score, comment, add_time, merchant_reply_content, merchant_reply_time, is_del, is_reply, ctime, pics ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unique,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productScore,jdbcType=BIT}, #{serviceScore,jdbcType=BIT}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantReplyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantReplyTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isReply,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pics,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
